Symbol.Script_2D:
PAPER_TO_MODEL = GLOB_SCALE / 1000 ! Convert paper size to model size MODEL_TO_PAPER = 1000 / GLOB_SCALE ! Convert model size to paper size
for _i = 2 to vardim1(iBreakpointS) if iBreakpointS[_i] >= GLOB_SCALE \ then scale~ = _i _i = 2 else scale~ = 0 endif next _i
if bScaleSensitive then _iScale = SCALE_200 if GLOB_SCALE < 100 + eps then _iScale = SCALE_100 if GLOB_SCALE < 50 + eps then _iScale = SCALE_50 else _iScale = SCALE_INSENSITIVE endif
! number of available rows is managed by "maxFunctionOrder" parameter dim functionOrder2D[14] functionOrder2D[1] = iOrder_1[_iScale] functionOrder2D[2] = iOrder_2[_iScale] functionOrder2D[3] = iOrder_3[_iScale] functionOrder2D[4] = iOrder_4[_iScale] functionOrder2D[5] = iOrder_5[_iScale] functionOrder2D[6] = iOrder_6[_iScale] functionOrder2D[7] = iOrder_7[_iScale] functionOrder2D[8] = iOrder_8[_iScale] functionOrder2D[9] = iOrder_9[_iScale] functionOrder2D[10] = iOrder_10[_iScale] functionOrder2D[11] = iOrder_11[_iScale] functionOrder2D[12] = iOrder_12[_iScale] functionOrder2D[13] = iOrder_13[_iScale] functionOrder2D[14] = iOrder_14[_iScale]
! ============================================================================== ! Content ! 1 : None -> "" ! 2 : Zone Name -> title ! 3 : Zone No. -> title ! 4 : Measured Area -> title + calculeted value with unit ! 5 : Measured Tsubo Area -> title + calculeted value with unit / duplicated areas (TAI) ! 6 : Calculated Area -> title + calculeted value with unit ! 7 : Calculated Tsubo Area -> title + calculeted value with unit / duplicated areas (TAI) ! 8 : Flooring -> title ! 9 : Perimeter -> title + calculeted value with unit ! 10 : Ceiling Height -> title + calculeted value with unit ! 11 : Volume -> title + calculeted value with unit ! 12 : Occupancy -> title ! 13 : Zone ID -> title ! 14 : Classification and Properties -> Parametergruop ! 15 : Custom Text -> title ! 16 : Room Number -> title (USA) ! 17 : Zone Name and Number -> title (USA) ! 18 : Surface Code -> title (USA) ! ==============================================================================
! Displayed groups and their booleans line by line ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim bParam[] dim iParentGroup[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber bParam[i] = 0 iParentGroup[i] = 0 next i
for i = 1 to numDisplayedGroup[_iScale] ! Just String if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_ZONE_ID then bParam[ROW_ZONE_ID] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_ZONE_ID] = ORDER_ZONE_ID if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_ZONE_NAME then bParam[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = ORDER_ZONE_NAME
if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_ZONE_NUMBER then bParam[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = ORDER_ZONE_NUMBER ! calculeted value with unit if not(bEnableTsuboArea) | (bEnableTsuboArea and iAreaUnit <> AREA_UNIT_TSUBO_ONLY) then if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_MEAS_AREA then bParam[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = ORDER_MEAS_AREA endif if bEnableTsuboArea and iAreaUnit <> AREA_UNIT_PROJECT then if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_MEAS_AREA then bParam[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = ORDER_MEAS_AREA endif if not(bEnableTsuboArea) | (bEnableTsuboArea and iAreaUnit <> AREA_UNIT_TSUBO_ONLY) then if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_CALC_AREA then bParam[ROW_CALC_AREA] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_CALC_AREA] = ORDER_CALC_AREA endif if bEnableTsuboArea and iAreaUnit <> AREA_UNIT_PROJECT then if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_CALC_AREA then bParam[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = ORDER_CALC_AREA endif ! Just String if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_FLOORING then bParam[ROW_FLOORING] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_FLOORING] = ORDER_FLOORING ! calculeted value with unit if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_PERIMETER then bParam[ROW_PERIMETER] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_PERIMETER] = ORDER_PERIMETER if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_CEIL_HEIGHT then bParam[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = ORDER_CEIL_HEIGHT if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_VOLUME then bParam[ROW_VOLUME] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_VOLUME] = ORDER_VOLUME ! Just String if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_OCCUPANCY then bParam[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = ORDER_OCCUPANCY if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_CUSTOM_TEXT then bParam[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = ORDER_CUSTOM_TEXT if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_ROOM_NUMBER then bParam[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = ORDER_ROOM_NUMBER if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_NAME_AND_NUMBER then bParam[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = ORDER_NAME_AND_NUMBER if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_SURFACE_CODE then bParam[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = ORDER_SURFACE_CODE ! String Table if functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_ADD_TAGS then bParam[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = 1 : iParentGroup[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = ORDER_ADD_TAGS next i
dim stRowDescription[] stRowDescription[ROW_NONE] = `` stRowDescription[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = `Zone Name` stRowDescription[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = `Zone No.` stRowDescription[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = `Measured Area` stRowDescription[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = `Measured Area in Tsubo` stRowDescription[ROW_CALC_AREA] = `Calculated Area` stRowDescription[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = `Calculated Area in Tsubo` stRowDescription[ROW_FLOORING] = `Flooring` stRowDescription[ROW_PERIMETER] = `Perimeter` stRowDescription[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = `Ceiling Height` stRowDescription[ROW_VOLUME] = `Volume` stRowDescription[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = `Occupancy` stRowDescription[ROW_ZONE_ID] = `Zone ID` stRowDescription[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = `Custom Text` stRowDescription[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = `Room Number` stRowDescription[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = `Zone Name and Number` stRowDescription[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = `Surface Code` stRowDescription[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = `Classification and Properties`
! Displayed strings and prefixes ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim titleString[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber titleString[i] = "" next i
catname = "" catcode = "" rrr = request("Zone_category", "", catname, catcode)
dim _MasterID[] result = 0 if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE <> 5 then ! Parameter Script result = REQUEST("Full_ID_of_parent", "", _MasterID) endif
titleString[ROW_ZONE_ID] = "" if result then if iShowZoneIDAs = IDVALUE_IDNUMBER then titleString[ROW_ZONE_ID] = _MasterID[vardim1(_MasterID)] else for i = 1 to vardim1 (_MasterID) titleString[ROW_ZONE_ID] = titleString[ROW_ZONE_ID] + _MasterID[i] next i endif else if iShowZoneIDAs = IDVALUE_IDNUMBER then titleString[ROW_ZONE_ID] = "<" + `Zone ID` + ">" else titleString[ROW_ZONE_ID] = "<" + `Zone Hotlink ID` + ">" endif endif if cn_zn then ! Display Category Name as Zone name titleString[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = catname else titleString[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = ROOM_NAME endif titleString[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = ROOM_NUMBER titleString[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = GrossAreaText if bEnableTsuboArea then titleString[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = GrossAreaText endif titleString[ROW_CALC_AREA] = areatext if bEnableTsuboArea then titleString[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = areatext endif titleString[ROW_FLOORING] = basec titleString[ROW_PERIMETER] = peritext if iTypeCeilContent = CEIL_VALUE then titleString[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = ceiltext else titleString[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = strTypeCeilContent[2] endif titleString[ROW_VOLUME] = VolumeText titleString[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = gs_occupancy_text + result_occupancy titleString[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = prefixCustomText + contentCustomText if bEnableZone1CustomText2 then titleString[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = prefixRoomNumber + contentRoomNumber endif
if bByCategoryNameAndNumber then ! Display Category Name as Zone name _sName = catname else _sName = ROOM_NAME endif if iOrderNameandNumber = ZONE_NAME_FIRST then titleString[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = _sName + " " + ROOM_NUMBER else titleString[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = ROOM_NUMBER + " " + _sName endif
if bEnableZone1SurfaceCode then dim _contentSurfaceCode[4][3] SC_PREF = 1 SC_SEPR = 2 SC_NAME = 3 ! Initialization for iSc = 1 to 4 _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_PREF] = "" _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_SEPR] = "" _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_NAME] = "" next iSc
if iComponentSurfaceCode <> SURFACE_NAME then _contentSurfaceCode[1][SC_PREF] = contentFloorFinish _contentSurfaceCode[2][SC_PREF] = contentBaseFinish _contentSurfaceCode[3][SC_PREF] = contentWallFinish _contentSurfaceCode[4][SC_PREF] = contentCeilingFinish endif
if iComponentSurfaceCode <> CUSTOM_CODE then rrr = request ("Name_of_material", matFloorFinish, _contentSurfaceCode[1][SC_NAME] ) rrr = request ("Name_of_material", matBaseFinish, _contentSurfaceCode[2][SC_NAME] ) rrr = request ("Name_of_material", matWallFinish, _contentSurfaceCode[3][SC_NAME] ) rrr = request ("Name_of_material", matCeilingFinish, _contentSurfaceCode[4][SC_NAME] ) endif
for iSc = 1 to 4 if _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_PREF] <> "" and _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_NAME] <> "" then _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_SEPR] = " " endif next iSc
! for calculating symmetric cell sizes, the longest win, the cells separators are the frame offset dim _sSurfaceCodesByRow[4] for iSc = 1 to 4 _sSurfaceCodesByRow[iSc] = _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_PREF] + _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_SEPR] + _contentSurfaceCode[iSc][SC_NAME] next iSc
_maxCell = 0 _hasMaxCell = 0 for k = 1 to 4 if (max(_maxCell, stw(_sSurfaceCodesByRow[k]) ) - stw(_sSurfaceCodesByRow[k])) < EPS then _hasMaxCell = k _maxCell = stw(_sSurfaceCodesByRow[k]) endif next k
_separator = " " titleString[ROW_SURFACE_CODE]= _sSurfaceCodesByRow[1] + _separator + \ _separator + _sSurfaceCodesByRow[2] + _separator +\ _separator + _sSurfaceCodesByRow[3] + _separator +\ _separator + _sSurfaceCodesByRow[4]
endif
! Categories and Properties ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
_numPropRow = 0 nRowProperty = 0 nColuProperty = 0
if bParam[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = 1 then
! Initialization for returned parameters dim listProperty[] listProperty[1] = ""
dim _contentProp[] _contentProp[1] = ""
gosub "getPropData" endif
! Displayed quantities ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim quantities[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber quantities[i] = 0 next i _calcTsubo = 3.3060
quantities[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = 0 quantities[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = 0 quantities[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = ROOM_AREA if bEnableTsuboArea then quantities[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = ROOM_AREA / _calcTsubo endif quantities[ROW_CALC_AREA] = ROOM_CALC_AREA if bEnableTsuboArea then quantities[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = ROOM_CALC_AREA / _calcTsubo endif quantities[ROW_FLOORING] = 0 quantities[ROW_PERIMETER] = ROOM_PERIM quantities[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = ROOM_HEIGHT quantities[ROW_VOLUME] = ROOM_VOLUME quantities[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = 0 quantities[ROW_ZONE_ID] = 0 quantities[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = 0 quantities[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = 0 if bEnableZone1CustomText2 then quantities[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = 0 endif quantities[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = 0 if bEnableZone1SurfaceCode then quantities[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = 0 endif quantities[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = 0
! Displayed quantities formats ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim iQuantitiyFormats[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber iQuantitiyFormats[i] = 0 next i dim sCustomQuantitiyFormats[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber sCustomQuantitiyFormats[i] = "" next i
iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = 0 iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = 0 iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = 9 ! unitType = "Area_dimension" if bEnableTsuboArea then iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = 0 sCustomQuantitiyFormats[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = "%~0." + str(iAreaDecimalOptions,1,0) + `Tsubo` endif iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_CALC_AREA]= 9 ! unitType = "Area_dimension" if bEnableTsuboArea then iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = 0 sCustomQuantitiyFormats[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = "%~0." + str(iAreaDecimalOptions,1,0) + `Tsubo` endif iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_FLOORING] = 0 iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_PERIMETER] = 10 ! unitType = "Calc_length_unit" if iTypeCeilContent = CEIL_VALUE then iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = 10 ! unitType = "Calc_length_unit" else iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = 0 endif iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_VOLUME] = 12 ! unitType = "Calc_volume_unit" iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = 0 iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_ZONE_ID] = 0 iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = 0 iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = 0 iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = 0 if bEnableZone1CustomText2 then iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = 0 endif iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER]= 0 if bEnableZone1SurfaceCode then iQuantitiyFormats[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = 0 endif
! ============================================================================== ! Frame Function : "Show Frame" Boolean ! On: assign the unique settings (every line've own frame) ! Off: turn off and hide everything about the frame ! ==============================================================================
dim _rowFrame[] _rowFrame[ROW_NONE] = 0 _rowFrame[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = bFrameName _rowFrame[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = bFrameNum _rowFrame[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = bFrameGrossArea _rowFrame[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = bFrameGrossArea _rowFrame[ROW_CALC_AREA] = bFrameArea _rowFrame[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = bFrameArea _rowFrame[ROW_FLOORING] = bFrameCode _rowFrame[ROW_PERIMETER] = bFramePeri _rowFrame[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = bFrameCeil _rowFrame[ROW_VOLUME] = bFrameVolume _rowFrame[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = gs_show_frame_occupancy _rowFrame[ROW_ZONE_ID] = bFrameZoneID _rowFrame[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = bFrameCustomText _rowFrame[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = bFrameRoomNumber _rowFrame[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = bFrameNameAndNumber _rowFrame[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = bFrameSurfaceCode _rowFrame[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = bFrameAdditionalTags
if not(bFrame[_iScale]) then for iFrame = 1 to vardim1(_rowFrame) _rowFrame[iFrame] = 0 next iFrame endif
iValidZone = 0 for i = 1 to numDisplayedGroup[_iScale] if functionOrder2D[i] <> ORDER_NONE then iValidZone = iValidZone + 1 next i if iValidZone = 0 then end for i = numDisplayedGroup[_iScale] + 1 to maxFunctionOrder functionOrder2D[i] = ORDER_NONE next i
! ============================================================================== ! Row_Number's Definition ! ============================================================================== nFrontNoneRows = 0 bOnlyNone = 1 for iFront = 1 to numDisplayedGroup[_iScale] if functionOrder2D[iFront] = ORDER_NONE & bOnlyNone = 1 then nFrontNoneRows = nFrontNoneRows + 1 else bOnlyNone = 0 endif next iFront nBackNoneRows = 0 bOnlyNone = 1 for iBack = numDisplayedGroup[_iScale] to 1 step -1 if functionOrder2D[iBack] = ORDER_NONE & bOnlyNone = 1 then nBackNoneRows = nBackNoneRows + 1 else bOnlyNone = 0 endif next iBack
! Real Row Order dim RowOrder[] j = 1 for iOrder = nFrontNoneRows+1 to numDisplayedGroup[_iScale] - nBackNoneRows for iValue = 1 to _maxGroupDisplay if functionOrder2D[iOrder] = iValue then for iRow = 1 to maxRowNumber if iParentGroup[iRow] = iValue then RowOrder[j] = iRow j = j + 1 endif next iRow if functionOrder2D[iOrder] = ORDER_NONE then RowOrder[j] = ROW_NONE j = j + 1 endif endif next iValue next iOrder

areapen else penFont[ROW_CALC_AREA] = AC_TextPen_1 penFont[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO]= AC_TextPen_1 endif if bOverrideCodeTextFormat then penFont[ROW_FLOORING] = codepen else penFont[ROW_FLOORING] = else penFont[ROW_ZONE_ID] = AC_TextPen_1 endif if bOverrideCustomTextFormat then penFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = customTextPen else penFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = AC_TextPen_1 endif if nameAndNumberPen else penFont[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = AC_TextPen_1 endif if bOverrideSurfaceCodeTextFormat then penFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = surfaceCodepen else penFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = AC_TextPen_1 endif if bOverrideAddTagTextFormat then penFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = AdditionalTagsPen else penFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = AC_TextPen_1 endif
dim nameStyle[] nameStyle[ROW_NONE] = "Nonestyle" nameStyle[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = "znamestyle" nameStyle[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = "znumstyle" nameStyle[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = "GrossArStyle" nameStyle[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = "GrossArStyleTsubo" nameStyle[ROW_CALC_AREA] = "arstyle" nameStyle[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = "arstyleTsubo" nameStyle[ROW_FLOORING] = "codestyle" nameStyle[ROW_PERIMETER] = "pestyle" nameStyle[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = "chstyle" nameStyle[ROW_VOLUME] = "VolStyle" nameStyle[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = "OccuStyle" nameStyle[ROW_ZONE_ID] = "ZoneIDStyle" nameStyle[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = "CustomStyle" nameStyle[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = "roomNumberStyle" nameStyle[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = "NameAndNumberStyle" nameStyle[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = "surfaceCodeStyle" nameStyle[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = "AdditionalTagsStyle"

then styleFont[ROW_CALC_AREA] = iTextStyleArea styleFont[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = iTextStyleArea else styleFont[ROW_CALC_AREA] = AC_TextStyle_1 styleFont[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = AC_TextStyle_1 endif if AC_TextStyle_1 endif if bOverrideVolumeTextFormat then styleFont[ROW_VOLUME] = iTextStyleVolume else styleFont[ROW_VOLUME] = AC_TextStyle_1 endif if bOverrideOccupancyTextFormat then styleFont[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = iTextStyleOccupancy else styleFont[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = AC_TextStyle_1 endif if bOverrideZoneIDTextFormat then styleFont[ROW_ZONE_ID] = iTextStyleZoneID else styleFont[ROW_ZONE_ID] = AC_TextStyle_1 endif if bOverrideCustomTextFormat then styleFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = iTextStyleCustomText else styleFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = AC_TextStyle_1 endif if styleFont[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = iTextStyleNameAndNumber else styleFont[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = AC_TextStyle_1 endif if bOverrideSurfaceCodeTextFormat then styleFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = iTextStyleSurfaceCode else styleFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = AC_TextStyle_1 endif if bOverrideAddTagTextFormat then styleFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = iTextStyleAdditionalTags else styleFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = dim sizeFont[]
if iFontSizeType = FONTSCALE_PAPER then sizeFont[ROW_NONE] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = AC_TextSize_1 sizeFont[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO]= sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_CALC_AREA] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO]= sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_FLOORING] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_PERIMETER] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_VOLUME] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_ZONE_ID] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = AC_TextSize_1 sizeFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] sizeFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = sizeFontData_mm[_iScale] else ! style commands font size go on always as paper size ! so need to be corrected _modelToPaper = 1000/GLOB_SCALE
sizeFont[ROW_NONE] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = AC_TextSize_1 * 100/GLOB_SCALE sizeFont[ROW_ZONE_NUMBER] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_CALC_AREA] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_CALC_AREA_TSUBO] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_FLOORING] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_PERIMETER] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_CEIL_HEIGHT] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_VOLUME] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_OCCUPANCY] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_ZONE_ID] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER] = AC_TextSize_1 * 100/GLOB_SCALE sizeFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper sizeFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = sizeFontData_model[_iScale] * _modelToPaper
endif
dim typeFont[] typeFont[ROW_NONE] = zonofont ! not relevant if bOverrideZoneNameTextFormat then typeFont[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = fonttypeZoneName else typeFont[ROW_ZONE_NAME] = AC_TextFont_1 endif if typeFont[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = GrossAreaFont else typeFont[ROW_MEAS_AREA] = AC_TextFont_1 typeFont[ROW_MEAS_AREA_TSUBO] = AC_TextFont_1 endif if bOverrideAreaTextFormat then typeFont[ROW_CALC_AREA] = bOverrideZoneIDTextFormat then typeFont[ROW_ZONE_ID] = fonttypeZoneID else typeFont[ROW_ZONE_ID] = AC_TextFont_1 endif if bOverrideCustomTextFormat then typeFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = fonttypeCustomText else typeFont[ROW_CUSTOM_TEXT] = AC_TextFont_1 endif if bOverrideRoomNumberTextFormat then typeFont[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = fonttypeRoomNumber else typeFont[ROW_ROOM_NUMBER] = AC_TextFont_1 endif if typeFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = fonttypeSurfaceCode else typeFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = AC_TextFont_1 endif if bOverrideAddTagTextFormat then typeFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = AdditionalTagsFont else typeFont[ROW_ADD_TAGS] = AC_TextFont_1 endif
dim heightStyle[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber define style{2} nameStyle[i] typeFont[i], sizeFont[i], styleFont[i] rrr = request("Height_of_style", nameStyle[i], heightStyle[i]) next i
dim lengthFrameOffset[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber lengthFrameOffset[i] = 2
! exeptions if (i = ROW_ZONE_NAME & not(bZoneNameAllign) & not(_rowFrame[ROW_ZONE_NAME]) ) |\ (i = ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER & not(bNameAllignNameAndNumber) & not(_rowFrame[ROW_NAME_AND_NUMBER])) then lengthFrameOffset[i] = 0 endif

dim lengthContentString[] dim heightRow[] for i = 1 to maxRowNumber lengthContentString[i] = 0 heightRow[i] = 0 next i max_len = 0 max_h = 0
for iCalculated = 1 to vardim1(RowOrder) iRow = RowOrder[iCalculated]
style nameStyle[iRow] if bParam[iRow] | iRow = ROW_NONE then j = iRow bShowText = 0 if iRow = ROW_ADD_TAGS then for _prop = 1 to _numPropRow titleString[iRow] = _contentProp[_prop] gosub "calculateorDrawUnit" ! returned totalLength = calculeted value with unit lengthContentString[iRow] = totalLength * AC_TextCharSpaceFactor_1 * AC_TextCharWidthFactor_1
heightRow[iRow] = totalHeight * AC_TextLeading_1 lengthContentString[iRow] = lengthContentString[iRow] + lengthFrameOffset[iRow]
if max_len < lengthContentString[iRow] then max_len = lengthContentString[iRow] endif
max_h = max_h + heightRow[iRow] next _prop else gosub "calculateorDrawUnit" ! returned totalLength = calculeted value with unit lengthContentString[iRow] = totalLength * AC_TextCharSpaceFactor_1 * AC_TextCharWidthFactor_1 if iRoW = ROW_SURFACE_CODE then ! keep out of using paragraph _calc = 1 : _draw = 0 gosub "calc_or_draw_SurfaceCode" ! returned lengthContentString[], totalHeight endif

if max_len < lengthContentString[iRow] then max_len = lengthContentString[iRow] endif
max_h = max_h + heightRow[iRow] endif
endif next iCalculated
if (iTypeStampWidth[_iScale] = WIDTH_CUSTOM) then max_len = widthFixedStamp[_iScale] endif
max_h = - max_h
if scale~ then HOTSPOT2 0, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -1, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + 0, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 -1, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + 0, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 -1, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + 0, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 -1, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + 0, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 -1, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
if bShowMiddleHotspots[_iScale] then HOTSPOT2 0, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -1, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, max_h/2 -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 0, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -1, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -max_h/2 -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + 0, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 -1, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + 0, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 -1, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1
HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, 0, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 1 + 128 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 2 : UnID = UnID + 1 HOTSPOT2 -max_len/2 + xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, -1, UnID, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_], 3 : UnID = UnID + 1 endif
add2 xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_X_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER, xScaleOffsetS[scale~][_Y_] * MODEL_TO_PAPER endif
! ============================================================================== ! Position ! ==============================================================================
xPosAnchor = 0 yPosAnchor = 0
if iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_TOP_MIDDLE |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_CENTER |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_BOTTOM_MIDDLE then xPosAnchor = -max_len/2
if iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_TOP_RIGHT |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_MIDDLE_RIGHT |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_BOTTOM_RIGHT then xPosAnchor = -max_len
if iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_MIDDLE_LEFT |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_CENTER |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_MIDDLE_RIGHT then yPosAnchor = -max_h/2
if iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_BOTTOM_LEFT |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_BOTTOM_MIDDLE |\ iAnchorStamp[_iScale] = ANCHOR_BOTTOM_RIGHT then yPosAnchor = -max_h
add2 xPosAnchor, yPosAnchor
! ============================================================================== ! Draw stamp line by line ! ==============================================================================
vlen = 0 _upper = 0 : _lower = 0
for i = 1 to vardim1(RowOrder) iRow = RowOrder[i]
if iRow = ROW_ADD_TAGS then for _prop = 1 to _numPropRow ! check the line before and after the current one to set frame if i > 1 then if _prop > 1 then _upper = _rowFrame[RowOrder[i]] else _upper = _rowFrame[RowOrder[i-1]] endif endif
if _prop < _numPropRow then _lower = _rowFrame[RowOrder[i]] else if i < vardim1(RowOrder) then _lower = _rowFrame[RowOrder[i+1]] else _lower = 0 endif endif
titleString[iRow] = _contentProp[_prop] gosub "drawTextandFrame"
vlen = vlen + heightRow[iRow] next _prop else ! check the line before and after the current one to set frame if i > 1 then _upper = _rowFrame[RowOrder[i-1]] if i < vardim1(RowOrder) then _lower = _rowFrame[RowOrder[i+1]] else _lower = 0 endif
gosub "drawTextandFrame"
vlen = vlen + heightRow[iRow] endif next i
! ============================================================================== ! Hotspot ! ==============================================================================
hotspot2 0, 0 hotspot2 max_len, 0 hotspot2 0, max_h hotspot2 max_len, max_h hotspot2 max_len/2, max_h/2
fill filltypeBackgroundFill[_iScale] if abs(max_len) > EPS and abs(max_h) > EPS then poly2_B{2} 5,2, penBackgroundFill[_iScale], backpenBackgroundFill[_iScale], 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, max_h, 1, max_len, max_h, 1, max_len, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1 endif
if bShowMiddleHotspots[_iScale] then hotspot2 max_len/2, 0 hotspot2 max_len/2, max_h hotspot2 0, max_h/2 hotspot2 max_len, max_h/2 endif
end
! ============================================================================== ! Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
"drawTextandFrame":
pen penFont[iRow] style nameStyle[iRow]
bShowText = 1 j = iRow if iRow = ROW_SURFACE_CODE then ! drawing Surface Codes in the center of code cells add2 0,-vlen
_calc = 0 : _draw = 1 gosub "calc_or_draw_SurfaceCode"
del 1 else if iAlignment[_iScale] = ALIGN_LEFT then add2 lengthFrameOffset[iRow]/2,-vlen endif if iAlignment[_iScale] = ALIGN_CENTERED then add2 max_len/2,-vlen if iAlignment[_iScale] = ALIGN_RIGHT then add2 max_len - lengthFrameOffset[iRow]/2,-vlen endif
gosub "calculateorDrawUnit"
del 1 endif
gosub "DrawOneFrame"
return
! ============================================================================== ! DrawOneFrame ! Parameters: heightRow[iRow], iOrder ! ============================================================================== "DrawOneFrame": ! Frame
if _rowFrame[iRow] then pen penFrame[_iScale] if not(bCellLineInside[_iScale]) then line2 0, -vlen, 0, -vlen - heightRow[iRow] !Vertical 1 line2 max_len, -vlen, max_len, -vlen - heightRow[iRow] !Vertical 2
if _upper = 0 then ! line before doesn't have a top neighbor or the neighbors frame is off line2 0, -vlen, max_len, -vlen endif if _lower = 0 then ! line after doesn't have a bottom neighbor or the neighbors frame is off line2 0, -vlen - heightRow[iRow], max_len, -vlen - heightRow[iRow] endif else rect2 0, -vlen, max_len, -vlen - heightRow[iRow] endif if iRow = ROW_SURFACE_CODE and bCellLineInside[_iScale] = 1 then style nameStyle[iRow] _posx = _widthcells line2 _posx, -vlen, _posx, -vlen - heightRow[iRow] _posx = _posx + _widthcells line2 _posx, -vlen, _posx, -vlen - heightRow[iRow] _posx = _posx + _widthcells line2 _posx, -vlen, _posx, -vlen - heightRow[iRow] endif endif
return
! ============================================================================== ! Calculate width of the strings OR draw it ! input: ! quantities, iQuantitiyFormats,fonttype,fontsize,fontstyle ! globals: ! totalLength ! ============================================================================== "calculateorDrawUnit":
if iTypeStampWidth[_iScale] = WIDTH_CUSTOM then _widthFixedSize = widthFixedStamp[_iScale] * AC_TextCharSpaceFactor_1 * AC_TextCharWidthFactor_1 - lengthFrameOffset[j] else _widthFixedSize = 0 endif
mul2 MODEL_TO_PAPER, MODEL_TO_PAPER call "quantity_text_writer" parameters lengthValue = quantities[j], iUnitType = iQuantitiyFormats[j], GS_iMarkerDir = 1, horizontalAlignment = iAlignment[_iScale], ! 1:Left, 2:Center, 3:Right verticalAlignment = 2, ! Alignment_Top AC_TextFont = typeFont[j], AC_TextSize = sizeFont[j], AC_TextStyle = styleFont[j], penText = penFont[j], AC_TextCharWidthFactor = AC_TextCharWidthFactor_1, AC_TextCharSpaceFactor = AC_TextCharSpaceFactor_1, AC_TextLeading = 1, szPrefix = titleString[j], AC_Readable = 0, gs_readable_angle = 90, useLeadingAndDescent = 1, bShowText = bShowText, bShowUnit = 1, custom_form = sCustomQuantitiyFormats[j], bUseTextblock = 1, widthFixedSize = _widthFixedSize, returned_parameters totalLength, totalHeight del 1 return
! ============================================================================== "calc_or_draw_SurfaceCode": ! ============================================================================== ! Surface Codes have different drawing method ! - Cells are symmetric ! - The length of cells is following the widest cells size ! Input: ! _sSurfaceCodesByRow[] ! - surface code data by cells ! - [_hasMaxCell]: the widest string of Surface Code ! lengthFrameOffset[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] ! - frame offset of Surface Code ! max_len ! - maximum width of zone ! - with frame offset ! max_len ! - maximum width of zone ! - with frame offset ! Output: ! lengthContentString[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] ! - lengths of the Surface Code Row with all four cells within ! - with frame offset ! totalHeight ! - height of Surface Code ! ============================================================================== style nameStyle[ROW_SURFACE_CODE]
if _calc = 1 then ! for general calculating and keep out of using paragraph lengthContentString[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] = ( stw(_sSurfaceCodesByRow[_hasMaxCell]) + lengthFrameOffset[ROW_SURFACE_CODE]) * 4 totalHeight = heightStyle[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] endif
_widthcells = max_len/4
if _draw = 1 then _posx = _widthcells / 2 for iSc = 1 to 4 ! if the stamp width is custom and the surface codes don't fit in - by design if stw(_sSurfaceCodesByRow[iSc]) > _widthcells then _sPoint = "..." for ip = strlen(_sSurfaceCodesByRow[iSc]) to 1 step -1 _sRest = strsub(_sSurfaceCodesByRow[iSc], 1, ip ) if (stw(_sRest) + stw(_sPoint) ) < _widthcells then paragraph "Paragraph1" iAlignment[_iScale], 0, 0, 0, 1, 0 pen penFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] style nameStyle[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] _sRest + _sPoint endparagraph
textblock "Textblock1" _widthcells, 2, 0, AC_TextCharWidthFactor_1, AC_TextCharSpaceFactor_1, 0, "Paragraph1" richtext2 _posx, 0, "Textblock1" ip = 1 ! force loop end endif next ip else paragraph "Paragraph2" iAlignment[_iScale], 0, 0, 0, 1, 0 pen penFont[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] style nameStyle[ROW_SURFACE_CODE] _sSurfaceCodesByRow[iSc] endparagraph
textblock "Textblock2" _widthcells, 2, 0, AC_TextCharWidthFactor_1, AC_TextCharSpaceFactor_1, 0, "Paragraph2" richtext2 _posx, 0, "Textblock2" endif _posx = _posx + _widthcells next iSc endif
return
! ============================================================================== "getPropData" : ! Categories and Properties`re sorted from the Categories and Properties AC settings ! - subroutine function: setting number of Categories and Properties rows and content ! "None" displaying is by design: ! if a user sets the create sortings row type to none, then empty rows ! (epmty instead "none") would be displayed only between two non-empty rows, ! At the begin and at the end the empty rows are not displyed. ! For analyzing use TnCParamRequest macro with _sContentTnC array as returned variable ! for help: ! call "PropertyParamRequest_m" parameters all bDebug = 1 ! ==============================================================================
! Request results in multiple rows: ! group = 2; name = 3; value = 5 DIM _columns[5] ! [iTncDisplayData] _columns[1] = 3 * 5 ! DISPLAYDATABY_NAMEVALUE _columns[2] = 3 ! DISPLAYDATABY_NAME _columns[3] = 5 ! DISPLAYDATABY_VALUE _columns[4] = 2 * 3 ! DISPLAYDATABY_GROUPNAME _columns[5] = 2 * 3 * 5 ! DISPLAYDATABY_GROUPNAMEVALUE
call "PropertyParamRequest_m" parameters all bEnableScales = 0, bUsePropertyFolder = not(_columns[iTncDisplayData] mod 2), bUsePropertyName = not(_columns[iTncDisplayData] mod 3), bUsePropertyValue = not (_columns[iTncDisplayData] mod 5),
returned_parameters nRowProperty, nColuProperty, listProperty ! listProperty is became to a single dimension array (a type of linear array) ! it has to be sepparated by each columns
! Converting rows of the result for i = 1 to nRowProperty ! initializaton _contentProp[i] = ""
for j = 1 to nColuProperty _sContentCell = listProperty[nColuProperty * (i-1) + j] _sSeparator = "" if _contentProp[i] # "" and _sContentCell # "" then _sSeparator = ": " endif _contentProp[i] = _contentProp[i] + _sSeparator + _sContentCell next j next i
_numPropRow = nRowProperty
return
Symbol.Script_1D:
UnID = 1

if _bAdd then dim _iAddBreakpointS[] dim _bDeleteBreakpointS[] dim _iBreakpointS[] dim _xScaleOffsetS[][2]
for _j = vardim1(iAddBreakpointS)+1 to _i+1 step -1 _iAddBreakpointS[_j] = 0 _bDeleteBreakpointS[_j] = 0 _iBreakpointS[_j] = iBreakpointS[_j-1] _xScaleOffsetS[_j][_X_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j-1][_X_] _xScaleOffsetS[_j][_Y_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j-1][_Y_] next _j
_iAddBreakpointS[_i] = 0 !! _bDeleteBreakpointS[_i] = 0 _iBreakpointS[_i+1] = iAddBreakpointS[_i] _xScaleOffsetS[_i+1][_X_] = 0 _xScaleOffsetS[_i+1][_Y_] = 0
for _j = _i to 1 step -1 _iAddBreakpointS[_j] = 0 _bDeleteBreakpointS[_j] = 0 _iBreakpointS[_j] = iBreakpointS[_j] _xScaleOffsetS[_j][_X_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j][_X_] _xScaleOffsetS[_j][_Y_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j][_Y_] next _j
parameters iAddBreakpointS = _iAddBreakpointS, bDeleteBreakpointS = _bDeleteBreakpointS, iBreakpointS = _iBreakpointS, xScaleOffsetS = _xScaleOffsetS else iAddBreakpointS[_i] = 0 parameters iAddBreakpointS = iAddBreakpointS endif endif next _i endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "bDeleteBreakpointS" then for _i = 2 to vardim1(bDeleteBreakpointS) if bDeleteBreakpointS[_i] <> 0 then dim _iAddBreakpointS[] dim _bDeleteBreakpointS[] dim _iBreakpointS[] dim _xScaleOffsetS[][2]
for _j = vardim1(bDeleteBreakpointS) to _i+1 step -1 _iAddBreakpointS[_j-1] = _iAddBreakpointS[_j] _bDeleteBreakpointS[_j-1] = 0 _iBreakpointS[_j-1] = iBreakpointS[_j] _xScaleOffsetS[_j-1][_X_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j][_X_] _xScaleOffsetS[_j-1][_Y_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j][_Y_] next _j
for _j = _i-1 to 1 step -1 _iAddBreakpointS[_j] = 0 _bDeleteBreakpointS[_j] = 0 _iBreakpointS[_j] = iBreakpointS[_j] _xScaleOffsetS[_j][_X_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j][_X_] _xScaleOffsetS[_j][_Y_] = xScaleOffsetS[_j][_Y_] next _j
parameters iAddBreakpointS = _iAddBreakpointS, bDeleteBreakpointS = _bDeleteBreakpointS, iBreakpointS = _iBreakpointS, xScaleOffsetS = _xScaleOffsetS endif next _i endif

Symbol.Script_UI:
! ============================================================================= ! Display actual tabpages ! ============================================================================= ui_dialog `Settings` ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
ui_page TABID_Settings, TABID_Root, `Stamp Display Settings`, "uiTab_ZoneStampDisplay_hl(1)" gosub "SettingsPage" if bScaleSensitive then _Scale = SCALE_50 ui_page TABID_Content_50, TABID_Root, `Content 1:50`, "uiTab_ZoneContent_hl(1)" gosub "ContentPage"
ui_page TABID_Appearance_50, TABID_Root, `Appearance 1:50`, "uiTab_ZoneAppearance_hl(1)" gosub "AppearancePage"
_Scale = SCALE_100 ui_page TABID_Content_100, TABID_Root, `Content 1:100`, "uiTab_ZoneContent_hl(1)" gosub "ContentPage"
ui_page TABID_Appearance_100, TABID_Root, `Appearance 1:100`, "uiTab_ZoneAppearance_hl(1)" gosub "AppearancePage"
_Scale = SCALE_200 ui_page TABID_Content_200, TABID_Root, `Content 1:200`, "uiTab_ZoneContent_hl(1)" gosub "ContentPage"
ui_page TABID_Appearance_200, TABID_Root, `Appearance 1:200`, "uiTab_ZoneAppearance_hl(1)" gosub "AppearancePage" else _Scale = SCALE_INSENSITIVE ui_page TABID_Content, TABID_Root, `Content`, "uiTab_ZoneContent_hl(1)" gosub "ContentPage"
ui_page TABID_Appearance, TABID_Root, `Appearance`, "uiTab_ZoneAppearance_hl(1)" gosub "AppearancePage" endif
ui_page TABID_OverrideStyle, TABID_Root, `Text and Override Style`, "uiTab_OverrideTextStyle_hl(1)" gosub "OverrideStylePage"
ui_page TABID_ClassificationProperties, TABID_Root, `Classification and Properties`, "uiTab_addTags_hl(1)" gosub "ClassificationPropertiesPage"
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Image links for archive ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- file_dependence "uiTab_ZoneStampDisplay_hl(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_ZoneContent_hl(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_OverrideTextStyle_hl(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_addTags_hl(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_ZoneAppearance_hl(1)"
! ============================================================================== end ! ==============================================================================

! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "SettingsPage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ _pageStartY = 0 _infHeight = 19 _outfHeight = 15 _yOffset = 4 _xJumpButton = 37
_x1 = 0 _x2 = _x1 + 20 _x3 = 173 _x4 = 220 _x5 = _x4 + 20 _x6 = 444 - _xJumpButton _dy = 24
_yCurr = _pageStartY ui_outfield `Stamp Display Settings`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, 444, _outfHeight
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_radiobutton "bScaleSensitive", 1, `Scale Sensitive Display`, _x1, _yCurr, _x4 - 2, _infHeight ui_radiobutton "bScaleSensitive", 0, `Uniform Display`, _x4, _yCurr, 444 - _x4, _infHeight
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_separator _x1, _yCurr, 444, _yCurr
_yCurr = _yCurr + 6 + 3
ui_outfield `Content 1:50`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, _x3 - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * not(bScaleSensitive) ui_outfield `Content`, _x5, _yCurr + _yOffset, 444 - _x5 - _xJumpButton - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * bScaleSensitive if bScaleSensitive then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Content_hl(1)", _x3, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Content_50 ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID else ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Content_hl(1)", _x6, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Content ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_outfield `Content 1:100`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, _x3 - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * not(bScaleSensitive) ui_outfield `Appearance`, _x5, _yCurr + _yOffset, 444 - _x5 - _xJumpButton - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * bScaleSensitive
if bScaleSensitive then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Content_hl(1)", _x3, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Content_100 ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID else ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Appearance_hl(1)", _x6, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Appearance ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_outfield `Content 1:200`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, _x3 - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * not(bScaleSensitive) if bScaleSensitive then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Content_hl(1)", _x3, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Content_200 ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_outfield `Appearance 1:50`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, _x3 - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * not(bScaleSensitive) if bScaleSensitive then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Appearance_hl(1)", _x3, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Appearance_50 ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_outfield `Appearance 1:100`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, _x3 - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * not(bScaleSensitive) if bScaleSensitive then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Appearance_hl(1)", _x3, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Appearance_100 ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_outfield `Appearance 1:200`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, _x3 - 2, _outfHeight, 4 * not(bScaleSensitive) if bScaleSensitive then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "uiFunction_Appearance_hl(1)", _x3, _yCurr-2, _xJumpButton, 22, -TABID_Appearance_200 ! Set GLOB_UI_BUTTON_ID endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
_w = 30 _wMin = 30 _wMax = 60 _w2 = 200 _w3 = 130 _w4 = 50 _sep = 5 _yCurr = _yCurr + _dy - _sep _xCurr = _x1 wCheckBox = 13 wWindow = 444
_nInfields = 2 * (vardim1(iBreakpointS) - 1) + 1 _wInfield = min(max(int( (wWindow - _sep ) / _nInfields ), _wMin), _wMax)
_xCorrChckBx = int ((_wInField - wCheckBox) / 2) _xCorrStart = (wWindow - (_nInfields * (_sep + _wInfield) + _sep)) / 2
ui_outfield `Scale range for scale dependent offset`, _xCurr, _yCurr, _w2, _outfHeight
_xCurr = _xCurr + max(int(_xCorrStart), 0)
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy _yCurr2 = _yCurr + _dy
ui_infield{3} iAddBreakpointS[1], _xCurr, _yCurr, _wInfield, InfieldHgt \ ui_tooltip `Add a breakpoint`
_nInfieldsMax = (wWindow - _sep) / (_wMin + _sep)
if _nInfields <= _nInfieldsMax then !!!TODO ! iEnd = iStart + int( (_nInfields - 1) / 2) ! else iEnd = vardim1(iBreakpointS) endif
for _i = iStart to iEnd _xCurr = _xCurr + _Sep + _wInfield ui_infield{3} bDeleteBreakpointS[_i], _xCurr + _xCorrChckBx, _yCurr, wCheckBox, InfieldHgt \ ui_tooltip `Delete this breakpoint` ui_infield{3} iBreakpointS[_i], _xCurr, _yCurr2, _wInfield, InfieldHgt \ ui_tooltip `Scale of the breakpoint. Offset X: ` + \ str(xScaleOffsetS[_i][_X_], 4, 2) + ` Offset Y: ` + \ str(xScaleOffsetS[_i][_Y_], 4, 2)
_xCurr = _xCurr + _Sep + _wInfield ui_infield{3} iAddBreakpointS[_i], _xCurr, _yCurr, _wInfield, InfieldHgt \ ui_tooltip `Add a breakpoint` next _i return
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "ContentPage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim stRowNames[14] stRowNames[1] = "1." stRowNames[2] = "2." stRowNames[3] = "3." stRowNames[4] = "4." stRowNames[5] = "5." stRowNames[6] = "6." stRowNames[7] = "7." stRowNames[8] = "8." stRowNames[9] = "9." stRowNames[10] = "10." stRowNames[11] = "11." stRowNames[12] = "12." stRowNames[13] = "13." stRowNames[14] = "14."
dim stButtonUI[2] stButtonUI[1] = `Delete Row` stButtonUI[2] = `Add Row`
x1 = 5 x2 = 25 x11 = 227 x12 = 247
x3 = 220-13 x4 = 230-15 x5 = 358 x6 = 440-55 x7 = 440-35 x8 = 255 x9 = 266 x10 = 283 xEnd = 440
butXPos = 185 butXPos2 = 407 buttonX = 13 buttonY = 13 buttonOffsetY = 2
y0 = 16 dy = 33 yCurr = y0 InfieldHgt = 20 InfieldWdth = 152 OutfieldHgt = 15 matHeight = 23 xPen = 35 yPen = 22
ui_style 0, 0
yCurr = y0
dy = 33 - 4 * (maxFunctionOrder > 12)
for iRow = 1 to numDisplayedGroup[_Scale]
ui_style 0, 0 ui_outfield stRowNames[iRow], x1, yCurr, x2-x1-2, 15
ui_infield{3} functionOrderUI[iRow], x2, yCurr-4, InfieldWdth, InfieldHgt, 8, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", stGroupText[ORDER_ZONE_ID], ORDER_ZONE_ID, "", stGroupText[ORDER_ZONE_NAME], ORDER_ZONE_NAME, "", stGroupText[ORDER_ZONE_NUMBER], ORDER_ZONE_NUMBER, "", stGroupText[ORDER_ROOM_NUMBER], ORDER_ROOM_NUMBER, "", stGroupText[ORDER_NAME_AND_NUMBER], ORDER_NAME_AND_NUMBER, "", stGroupText[ORDER_MEAS_AREA], ORDER_MEAS_AREA, "", stGroupText[ORDER_CALC_AREA], ORDER_CALC_AREA, "", stGroupText[ORDER_FLOORING], ORDER_FLOORING, "", stGroupText[ORDER_SURFACE_CODE], ORDER_SURFACE_CODE, "", stGroupText[ORDER_PERIMETER], ORDER_PERIMETER, "", stGroupText[ORDER_CEIL_HEIGHT], ORDER_CEIL_HEIGHT, "", stGroupText[ORDER_VOLUME], ORDER_VOLUME, "", stGroupText[ORDER_OCCUPANCY], ORDER_OCCUPANCY, "", stGroupText[ORDER_ADD_TAGS], ORDER_ADD_TAGS, "", stGroupText[ORDER_CUSTOM_TEXT], ORDER_CUSTOM_TEXT, "", stGroupText[ORDER_NONE], ORDER_NONE
if numDisplayedGroup[_Scale] = 1 then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "ui_button_minus_lock_hl(1)", butXPos, yCurr-buttonOffsetY, buttonX, buttonY else ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "ui_button_minus_hl(1)", butXPos, yCurr-buttonOffsetY, buttonX, buttonY, (_idGlobButton[_Scale] + idButton_dropRow) + iRow ui_tooltip stButtonUI[1] endif
if numDisplayedGroup[_Scale] = maxFunctionOrder then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "ui_button_plus_lock_hl(1)", butXPos+15, yCurr-buttonOffsetY, buttonX, buttonY else ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "ui_button_plus_hl(1)", butXPos+15, yCurr-buttonOffsetY, buttonX, buttonY, (_idGlobButton[_Scale] + idButton_pasteRow) + iRow ui_tooltip stButtonUI[2] endif
yCurr = yCurr + dy if iRow = (maxFunctionOrder/2) then yCurr = yCurr - iRow*dy x1 = x11 x2 = x12 butXPos = butXPos2 endif next iRow
if numDisplayedGroup[_Scale] < maxFunctionOrder then ui_pict_button ui_function, "", "ui_button_plus_hl(1)", butXPos+15, yCurr-buttonOffsetY, buttonX, buttonY, (_idGlobButton[_Scale] + idButton_addnewRow) ui_tooltip stButtonUI[2] endif
return
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "AppearancePage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ pageStartY = 0 _xSep = 219 _xEnd = 444 _x1 = 0 _x3 = _xSep - 40 _x5 = _xSep + 5 _dy = 30 _infHeight = 19 _outfHeight = 15 _yOffset = 4
! Left Side _yCurr = pageStartY ui_style 0, 1 ui_infield{3} bFrame[_Scale], _x1, _yCurr, _xSep - 2, _infHeight, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Show Frame`, 0, 1, `Show Frame`, 1 ui_style 0, 0
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy ui_infield{3} bCellLineInside[_Scale], _x1, _yCurr, _xSep - 2, _infHeight, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Line between Details`, 0, 1, `Line between Details`, 1
_yCurr = _yCurr + _dy + 5 ui_outfield `Frame Pen`, _x1, _yCurr + _yOffset, _xSep - 35, _outfHeight , 4 * not(bFrame[_Scale]) ui_infield{3} penFrame[_Scale], _x3, _yCurr, 33, _infHeight
! _yCurr = _yCurr + _dy
